description: This file appears to be a source Python module that defines functions for generating C++ code related to JSON-RPC services, including emitting event and method wrappers, prologue/epilogue code, version info and registering/unregistering RPCs. It is part of a code generation tool for RPC stubs.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting JSON-RPC events, including parameters processing and callback registration.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue section of the RPC emitter in C++ including headers and namespace setup.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the epilogue section of the RPC emitter closing namespaces.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Outputs C++ namespace version info code based on the provided version tuple.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function assembling the RPC code including registration of methods/events, versioning, and namespace handling.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Top-level function to generate full RPC code including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates only the version-related RPC code section.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
